name: Kanade Rogue-like+
description:
"Kanade Rogue-like+" is a 3D rogue-like RPG where you control a tentacle-clothing-clad magical girl
named Kanade, and navigate randomized dungeons on your journey to save the world.

Featuring lots of silky-smooth pixel-art interspecies animation,
and a variety of defeat scene illustrations from many artists.

Come for the H, and stay for the deep gameplay!

This release builds off the free release "Kanade Rogue-like" with lots of added defeat scenes and dungeons.

[Story]
Kanade Atoji is a magical girl.
One day, while investigating a series of disappearances in town,
a dimensional disturbance sucks her into a another world.

There, she talks with a girl named Rubie, who informs her this world is on the verge of ruin.
Entrusted with the power of strange tentacle clothing, Kanade sets out to save the world.
Can she do it?

[Systems]
A rogue-like system with an action gauge, and high-ground / low-ground metrics.
You always enter dungeons at level 1, but you can use items from defeated enemies
to power up your tentacle clothing, craft items, and enhance Kanade's abilities.

The tentacle clothing improves Kanade's stats, but when her MP runs out, it assaults her.
The stronger the tentacle clothing, the stronger the stat increases, and the stronger the assaults...

Kanade's body will slowly get developed by both the tentacles, and monsters that violate that.
Climaxes drain her MP, so her sensitivity level is connected to the difficulty.
You can play strategically to keep her from climaxing, or you can ramp that sensitivity to the max,
and enjoy her climax uncontrollably, nonstop.

[Defeat Scenes]
When defeated by certain monsters, you'll trigger a defeat scene,
where you can enjoy a special illustration, and textual description of the aftermath.
16 illustrations are included total.

[Contents]
10 main dungeons
5 extra dungeons
Playtime: Approx. 10 hours for all main dungeons only.

A fully-complete save file is included in the 999th Load slot
for those who want to enjoy the H without playing the game.
